TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GregorianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar
.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit GregorianCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示公历。

span.span: Represents the Gregorian calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公历可识别两个纪元：公元前The Gregorian calendar recognizes two eras: B.C. 或 B.C.E.，以及公元or B.C.E., and A.D. 或公历or C.E. 此 类实现仅识别当前时代（公元This implementation of the class recognizes only the current era (A.D. 或公历）。or C.E.). > [!NOTE] > 有关在 .NET Framework 中使用 类和其他 calendar 类的信息，请参阅使用[日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 公历中的闰年定义为一个年份，该年份可被4整除，除非100可被。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by 4, unless it is divisible by 100. 但是，400可以整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900年不是闰年，而2000是。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一个常见年份有365天，闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 公历包含12个月，每个月28到31天：1月（31天），二月（28或29天），三月（31天），4月（30天），5月（31天），6月（30天），7月（31天），8月（31天），11月（30天），12月（31天）。The Gregorian calendar has 12 months with 28 to 31 days each: January (31 days), February (28 or 29 days), March (31 days), April (30 days), May (31 days), June (30 days), July (31 days), August (31 days), September (30 days), October (31 days), November (30 days), and December (31 days). 2月在闰年中有29天，在常见年份内有28天。February has 29 days during leap years and 28 during common years. > [!IMPORTANT] > 默认情况下，所有 和 值都以公历表示日期和时间。By default, all and values express dates and times in the Gregorian calendar. 公历作为儒略历（由 类表示）的替换项开发，最初在1582年10月15日的少数文化中引入。The Gregorian calendar was developed as a replacement for the Julian calendar (which is represented by the class) and was first introduced in a small number of cultures on October 15, 1582. 当使用在某个区域性采用公历日历之前的历史日期时，如果该日历在 .NET Framework 中可用，则应使用原始日历。When working with historic dates that precede a culture's adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the original calendar if it is available in the .NET Framework. 例如，丹麦将儒略历从儒略历改为1700年2月19日（公历日历）或3月1日（公历日历）。For example, Denmark changed from the Julian calendar to the Gregorian calendar on February 19 (in the Julian calendar) or March 1 (in the Gregorian calendar) of 1700. 在这种情况下，对于采用公历之前的日期，应使用 Julian 日历。In this case, for dates before the adoption of the Gregorian calendar, you should use the Julian calendar. 但请注意，任何区域性都不提供对 类的内部支持。However, note that no culture offers intrinsic support for the class. 必须使用 类作为独立日历。You must use the class as a standalone calendar. 有关详细信息，请参阅使用[日历](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars)。For more information, see [Working with calendars](/dotnet/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars). 下面的示例说明了儒略历1700年2月18日（即丹麦的 Julian 日历的最后一天），该日历是公历中早于1700的一天。The following example illustrates that February 18, 1700 in the Julian calendar, which is the last day the Julian calendar was officially used in Denmark, is one day earlier than March 1, 1700 in the Gregorian calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/cs/minimum1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.gregoriancalendar.class/vb/minimum1.vb#1)] 每个 都支持一组日历。Each supports a set of calendars. 属性返回区域性的默认日历， 属性返回一个数组，该数组包含该区域性支持的所有日历。The property returns the default calendar for the culture, and the property returns an array containing all the calendars supported by the culture. 若要更改 使用的日历，应用程序可以将 属性设置为新的 。To change the calendar used by a , the application can set the property to a new . 仅当在 中选择了 并且区域性使用 "公元" 时， 才会忽略缩写名称中的标点符号 ignores punctuation in abbreviated era names, only if the is selected in and the culture uses "A.D." 作为纪元名称，即 "公元"as the era name, that is, "A.D." 等效于 "AD"。is equivalent to "AD". ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示，仅当日历为公历并且区域性使用纪元名称 "公元" 时， 才会忽略纪元名称中的标点符号。The following code example shows that ignores the punctuation in the era name, only if the calendar is Gregorian and the culture uses the era name "A.D.". [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CPP/gregorian_getera.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/CS/gregorian_getera.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.GetEra/VB/gregorian_getera.vb#1)]

param.span: 将向其添加月数的 。

param.span: 要添加的月数。

summary.span: 返回与指定 相距指定月数的 。

span.span: Returns a that is the specified number of months away from the specified .

returns.span: 将指定月数添加到指定的 中时得到的 。

span.span: The that results from adding the specified number of months to the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果结果中的日不是生成的年份中的有效日期，则生成的 的日期部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 如果生成的月份超出指定的 的年份，则生成的 的年份部分会受到影响。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份在指定 的纪元外，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的 的时间部分与指定的 保持相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是10月（包含31天），指定的日期是该月的第31天，而 `months` 参数的值为6，则生成的年份比指定年份多一，生成的月份是4月，而结果日为第30天，即4月的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is October, which has 31 days, the specified day is the 31st day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 6, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is April, and the resulting day is the 30th day, which is the last day in April. 如果 `months` 参数的值为负，则生成的 早于指定的 。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的 值的 属性始终等于 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 方法来保留 `time` 参数的 属性，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的代码示例按公历显示 的多个组件的值。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CPP/gregoriancalendar_addget.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/CS/gregoriancalendar_addget.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_AddGet/VB/gregoriancalendar_addget.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果结果中的日不是生成的年份中的有效日期，则生成的 的日期部分会受到影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它将更改为生成的年份中的最后一个有效日。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所得 的月份部分保持与指定 相同。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现仅支持当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年份在指定 的纪元外，则会引发 。Therefore, is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 生成的 的时间部分与指定的 保持相同。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，2月有28天，在闰年有29天时除外。For example, February has 28 days, except during leap years when it has 29 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中2月29日的，而 `years` 的值为1，则生成的日期将是下一年2月28日。If the specified date is the 29th day of February in a leap year and the value of `years` is 1, the resulting date will be the 28th day of February in the following year. 如果 `years` 为负数，则生成的 早于指定的 。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 返回的 值的 属性始终等于 。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以通过调用 方法来保留 `time` 参数的 属性，如下面的示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的某一天定义为从该年的第一天开始的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，在第一个月的第一天 返回1，在上个月的最后一天 返回该年份中的总天数，这与 返回的值相同。For example, for the first day of the first month returns 1, and for the last day of the last month returns the total number of days in that year, which is the same value returned by . ## Examples 下面的代码示例按公历显示 的多个组件的值。The following code example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Gregorian calendar. param.name: year
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示年份。

span.span: An integer that represents the year.

param.name: month
param.span: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月份。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 12 that represents the month.

param.name: day
param.span: 1 到 31 之间的一个整数，用于表示天。

span.span: An integer from 1 to 31 that represents the day.

param.name: era
param.span: 一个整数，用于表示纪元。

span.span: An integer that represents the era.

summary.span: 确定指定纪元中的指定日期是否为闰日。

span.span: Determines whether the specified date in the specified era is a leap day.

returns.span: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公历中的闰年定义为一个年份，该年份被平均地除以四，只不过它可被100整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，400可以整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900年不是闰年，而2000是。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一个常见年份有365天，闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰日是指仅在闰年发生的日期。A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year. 在公历中，2月29日是唯一的闰日。In the Gregorian calendar, the 29th day of February is the only leap day. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将在每个纪元的五年中，为第二个月的最后一天（2月）调用 IsLeapDay。The following code example calls IsLeapDay for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CPP/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/CS/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.IsLeapDay/VB/gregoriancalendar_isleapday.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公历中的闰年定义为一个年份，该年份被平均地除以四，只不过它可被100整除。A leap year in the Gregorian calendar is defined as a year that is evenly divisible by four, except if it is divisible by 100. 但是，400可以整除的年份是闰年。However, years that are divisible by 400 are leap years. 例如，1900年不是闰年，而2000是。For example, the year 1900 was not a leap year, but the year 2000 was. 一个常见年份有365天，闰年有366天。A common year has 365 days and a leap year has 366 days. 闰月是只在闰年发生的整个月份。A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year. 公历没有任何闰月。The Gregorian calendar does not have any leap months. ## Examples 下面的代码示例为当前纪元中的五年中的所有月份调用 IsLeapMonth。The following code example calls IsLeapMonth for all the months in five years in the current era. summary.span: 获取 类型支持的最早日期和时间。

span.span: Gets the earliest date and time supported by the type.

value.span: 类型支持的最早日期和时间，即公元0001年1月1日开始的那一刻

span.span: The earliest date and time supported by the type, which is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E.
and is equivalent to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管 "" 属性的值是公元0001年1月1日开始的那一刻的时间，但在1582年10月15日之前不会引入公历，在欧洲大陆和全球范围内采用该日历速度缓慢。Although the value of the property is the first moment of January 1, 0001 C.E., the Gregorian calendar was not introduced until October 15, 1582, and its adoption throughout the European continent and worldwide was slow. 在采用公历日历之前，欧洲、美国和澳大利亚大陆的大多数文化都使用了儒略历，该日历由 类表示。Until they adopted the Gregorian calendar, most cultures in the European, American, and Australian continents used the Julian calendar, which is represented by the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例获取日历的最小值和最大值。The following code example gets the minimum value and the maximum value of the calendar. [!code-cpp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CPP/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/CS/gregoriancalendar_minmax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Globalization.GregorianCalendar_MinMax/VB/gregoriancalendar_minmax.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个两位数或四位数的整数，用于表示要转换的年份。

span.span: A two-digit or four-digit integer that represents the year to convert.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 包含 的四位数表示形式的整数。

span.span: An integer that contains the four-digit representation of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为100年范围内可由两位数年份表示的最后一年。 is the last year in the 100-year range that can be represented by a two-digit year. 通过在该100年范围内查找两位数 `year` 的唯一匹配项来确定纪元。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the two-digit `year` within that 100-year range. 例如，如果 设置为2029，则100年范围是从1930到2029。For example, if is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1930，而两位数字的值29则解释为2029。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 如果传递了一个两位数的年份值（小于100），则会使方法根据表示相应世纪的 值将值转换为四位值。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供了一个四位数的年份值，该范围在支持的日历范围内以 ，则该方法将返回实际输入值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供了一个在支持的日历范围之外的四位数值，或者如果它提供负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by the calendar.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int TwoDigitYearMax { get; set; }
.property instance int32 TwoDigitYearMax
Public Overrides Property TwoDigitYearMax As Integer
public: virtual property int TwoDigitYearMax { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.TwoDigitYearMax : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许将两位数的年份正确翻译为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果将此属性设置为2029，则100年范围是从1930到2029。For example, if this property is set to 2029, the 100-year range is from 1930 to 2029. 因此，两位数值30被解释为1930，而两位数字的值29则解释为2029。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1930, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 2029. 此属性的初始值派生自控制面板的 "区域和语言选项" 部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，在 的生命周期内，该信息可能会更改。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不会自动检测系统设置中的更改。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 应用程序应将此值设置为99，以指示要按字面取的两位数年份。The application should set this value to 99 to indicate that 2-digit years are to be taken literally. 例如，如果将此属性设置为99，则100年的范围是从0（对于大多数日历而言不是有效的值）到99。For example, if this property is set to 99, the 100-year range is from 0 (not a valid value for most calendars) to 99. 因此，两位数值30被解释为30。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 30.

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值小于 99。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is less than 99.
-or-

exception.span: 为设置操作指定的值大于 。

span.span: The value specified in a set operation is greater than .

exception.span: 在设置操作中，当前实例是只读的。

span.span: In a set operation, the current instance is read-only.
